metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2806 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was found that the ovirt-log-collector/sosreport collects the RHV admin password unfiltered. Fixed in: sos-4.2-20.el8_6, ovirt-log-collector-4.4.7-2.el8ev

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sosreport - 3.5-1~ubuntu14.04.3+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sosreport package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5-1~ubuntu14.04.3+esm1').
